Posts.Content: Feb 7, 2010 11:28AM rebeccacollins1 wrote: I also have a lovely sister.  I was also lucky enough to have a wonderful department at our hospital who was a great help in getting me the wig best for me.  I will be 2 years post chemo in July and my hair has grown back beautifully and I always had long hair and now I get so many compliments about my short style that I think I may keep it this way.  The time has gone so quickly and it will for you and before you know it your hair will be beautiful again.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
